Articles.Content: How can you not realize age is a matter of perspective? How do you sleep at night? Oh right, on a mattress and pillow stuffed with cheating! The fair way to think of it is you are young to some, old to others.

Um, excuse me? How can you not realize that assuming I even exist is cheating! I could be 1 millisecond old for all you know! There is no greater example of cheating than this!

Edited September 9, 2014 by Endersmens
"That"? You... a typo? Cheating!
Not keeping this thread bumped? PUMPKIN-EATER! You should be ashamed for not being a naturally born necromancer like the rest of us, you different person!

Hating on people who are different? It's as if you filled a barrel full of cheating, sealed it in a cellar for a decade, then drank its distilled cheating essence. Around here we like to be accepting of those who don't know the ways of the necromancer.
Oh. My guness. Accepting people? Do I smell cheating? Yes I do! The strong stench of cheating lays in a cloud around you! The only way to be totally accepting is by cheating, and that's cheating!
MAKING A TYPO? CHEATER! Everybody either has to be totally perfect, or dead!

That wasn't a typo. It's an accent joke.

Not getting it? Cheating is afoot!

Even though I always thought cheating was a hand....
An endersmans wearing earphones/warmers?? I didn't even know there's a cheat code for that!
You changed your avatar without me noticing and changed it back!? Cheater! Everyone knows I need to see ALL the pony avatars!
Must have been too busy... cheating!
Three avatars in 24 hours is cheating.
Posting yesterday? CLEARLY cheating....

Your avatar shows evidence of using a blue screen to fake landing on other planets. Obviously cheating is not just a hobby for you, it's a way of life. Real space programs spend billions to go to other planets, not mere millions to fake it with special effects.

Lol. Well REAL royalty make their crowns out of gold, this red (rusty?) iron business is clearly cheating...

Edited September 11, 2014 by hawkinator
Blah, obvious and disgusting cheat. Insulting the crown and not being executed! The only explanation is CHEAT!
Creating a new page (for mobile users)? BLATANT cheating...
You used unnecessary capital letters....there's only one thing that this could be, and it's cheating! Always use the proper amount of capital letters, like all of us non-cheaters.
You Used An Exclamation Point... Only Cheaters Use Symbols To Add Exclamatory Emphasis To Their Text....

I know that the keyboard technically lets us capitalize the first letter of every word, but I think that doing so makes getting your point across too easy and detracts from the challenge of posting on the forums. I mean, I know writing isn't competitive so it's technically impossible to cheat, but I don't capitalize every word because I like to write my posts realistically.

/kspforumspeak
Caring 'bout grammar and spelling? Dis is 2014, not sparta
You use dem grammaz and spellin. I smellz a CHEATA!!!

Verily, thou doth corrupt thine language. The lack of moral fortitude displayed can only be construed as such defiance of the established rules that I must assign thou the unenviable title of "Cheater". Use the correct forms of the mother tongue, I plead; that we might perceive thou as a steadfast and fair player.
Old English, and carin bout old English grammar?? Cheeta!

I think you are a cheat for how you post

Your lines are not of iambs grouped in five.

(aka cheating for not writing in iambic pentameter)
